articles.author: Ricci Rox
articles.title: Google Pixel Tablet set to be cheaper than the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Google is readying the Pixel Tablet for an I/O launch, where it's expected to debut alongside the Pixel 7a and Pixel Fold. Pricing information for the first-gen tablet in Europe has now leaked, indicating a lower price tag than that of its closest rival, the …
articles.content: As it stands, Google is expected to debut its first-gen tablet, the Pixel Tablet, on May 10 at I/O. Details of the Pixel Tablet have slowly been revealed over the past few months, and a new leak now … [+811 chars]
